Name: Majesty Metals
Description: Majesty Metals & Manufacturing is the oldest military manufacturer in the Magistracy of Canopus. With facilities on the capital world of Canopus, as well as Dunianshire, Majesty is the sole domestic provider of heavy arms to the Magistracy Armed Forces.
ReputationStatements: Commander, I have an interesting proposal for you. Let's discuss it over dinner and drinks? You're paying, of course.

MissionSuccessStatements: Ah Commander, so much dedication put into your work. Again. I am delightfully pleased and hoping that we'll meet again.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Sometimes you're just not into it. I guess I'll find some other company to finish what you've almost started.
BadFaithFailureStatements: All looks and zero action, hum? Too bad, you showed a trace of promise.
